text: Meh wae kilat mau nyamber pandelenge wong-wong munafiq, saben kilat mau cumleret madhangi marang si munafiq, banjur padha lumaku ana ing pepadhang. Dene yen pinuju petheng si munafiq banjur pahd ngadeg jejer. Saupama Allah kersa nyirnakake pangrungu lan pandelenge si munafiq kabeh mesthi kaleksanan. Satemene Allah iku kuwasa marang samu barang
